Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory897.jpg'}
{3: 'With the simple ceremony complete, new tombstones and fresh hopes hang from the branches.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucille', 3: "You've got everything packed? We need to leave soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "I'm sure we're gonna find ourselves a new home...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Bzzz—Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The terminal suddenly sends in Lucia's faint and distorted voice."}
{2: "What's up with the reception?", 3: '14', 4: 'Lucia?', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Bzzz—there's a Red Tide ahead! And we picked up a sign of a bunch of—bzzz—Hetero-Creatures!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The Red Tide is—bzzz—rising! It's coming your—bzzz—way!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Copy. Come join us quickly.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Copy—bzzz—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "You can't help but wonder why the reception is as poor as it is when Lucia is supposedly not that far from where you are."}
{3: 'Having no time to contemplate, you relay the news to Liv and Lucille right away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "There's no time. We have to get out of here immediately...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucille', 3: "Let's go and get the supplies we have stored up in the back.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucille wastes no time heeding the call.'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "We're out of time!", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Lucille waves you off before starting to pass down commands. The severely injured, elderly, and children board the large vehicle. Most of the young and able-bodied individuals head toward the supplies at the back.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Is there anything else that needs to be done?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You vaguely recall that this old gentleman was rescued by Lucia from the Red Tide.'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "Ah, I haven't had the chance to thank you yet. If it weren't for you, I probably...", 4: '1'}
{3: "He points to his bandaged leg and palm, which were mildly ulcerated from contact with the Red Tide's shallows."}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: 'Living may feel pointless, but at least I am still breathing and have something to hope for.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "Is there anything I can do? I'm not as badly injured as the others. I can still move.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You're still recovering... You shouldn't be doing this kind of work.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "Hey, it's alright, I can still walk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "These items go here. I'll push them over.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "Ha, don't worry. At least I can still walk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: 'If we move quickly, the chances of meeting or rescuing Garry will increase, even if just a little.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "He's a good lad. I even promised him I'd help him find a girlfriend later.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "Don't worry. Go do what you need to do. I'll be fine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "It's okay to be rescued, but we can't just sit around and wait for others to save us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "This land is yours as much as it is ours. In today's world, there are no true survivors.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: 'Alright, leave this to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gemira', 3: "You should take a break, young lady. You've been working for a while now. Even Constructs need to take care of themselves.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv stands frozen in place.'}
{3: 'Not far away, young and able-bodied refugees have already salvaged the first batch of supplies and loaded them onto the large vehicle.'}
{3: 'Lucia hurries back from scouting and assists you in helping the refugees with the first batch of supplies and the injured.'}
{3: 'Is it because this group of refugees in particular has a lot of supplies?'}
{3: "No... it's not that."}
{3: 'The little girl sucks her finger. Her longing gaze falls onto the compressed biscuits among the rescue supplies.'}
{3: "Well, then I presume it's because things on Earth have gotten better?"}
{3: "No... That's not it, either."}
{3: 'With the Red Tide and Hetero-Creatures surging in, humans now face a shrinking living space.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'In this world, no one is truly a survivor...', 4: '1'}
{3: "She mumbles, repeating the old man's words."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The young girl's eyes are firm and clear."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Hey... you're severely injured... Don't move! Your leg needs to be held in place!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before she even finishes what she has to say, another wounded person draws her attention.'}
{1: '1', 3: "The retreat operation continues orderly with everyone's help."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: 'Lucia has secured a safe location. Before the Red Tide flooded the previous settlement, the Gray Raven team had already relocated with this group of refugees to an area far from the Red Tide.'}
{3: 'Just as they are settling down, a group of unexpected individuals approaches the camp.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Old Lady', 3: 'Is... is this place safe?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Lady', 3: 'We... There are 13 of us. Can we rest here for a while?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Lady', 3: "Just a quick rest. We won't use any of your resources. We'll leave as soon as we're done resting...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The elderly woman nervously rubs her hands on her mud-stained clothes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucille', 3: "Don't worry. This area is safe—for now, at least.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "We've already sent scouts to check the area. You can rest easy here!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucille points the elderly woman away from their supply tents. One by one, disheveled refugees emerge from the forest behind her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tall Man', 3: 'Finally, a place to rest...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tall Man', 3: 'A Construct?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing Liv bandaging the wounded, the tall refugee jumps up in surprise.'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "Yes. I mean, we wouldn't have been here without them...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tall Man', 3: "Why? Why didn't you guys show up sooner?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tall Man', 3: 'Why... why did you withdraw the patrol nearby?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tall Man', 3: 'Why? Why!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tall Man', 3: 'If only you guys had come to our rescue from that way... and if only you had shown up sooner...!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tall Man', 3: "Then she wouldn't have died!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man roars, shaking with rage.'}
{2: 'Tall Man', 3: "If only you had come a bit earlier, just a bit earlier... she wouldn't have died... My mom...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tall Man', 3: "I don't want to see her in the Red Tide. What am I supposed to do...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Exhausted, he falls to his knees and cries out in anguish.'}
{3: 'The camp falls into a dead silence.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Refugee', 3: 'Sigh... so did my husband...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Feeling the sorrow, another weary refugee begins to sob quietly.'}
{2: 'Female Refugee', 3: "Why is Babylonia's rescue team always late...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Refugee', 3: 'Nobody would have chosen to be born into a world like this had they had a choice...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having grown accustomed to such accusations, they know that silence is their best response.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elean', 3: 'The patrol... was withdrawn because Constructs are susceptible to the virus, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elean', 3: "You wouldn't want to battle infected Constructs while dealing with the Red Tide, would you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tall Man', 3: "But that doesn't mean Babylonia can just abandon humans on Earth.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He jumps up in anger and clenches his fists tightly, but is unsure whom to direct his anger at.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucille', 3: "Hey! It's not like that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucille gently holds his clenched fist and softly loosens his stiff, dirt-covered fingers.'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "We're not giving up on anyone, and that's why we came.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Cry if you need to. Grief is a divine right given to humanity, and tears are the proof of the lives once lived.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'The sun will rise again, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In times like this, food is the best comfort for sorrow.'}
{3: 'The friction between the two groups of refugees quickly subsides. Soon they are sitting around the bonfire and sharing a pot of steaming wild vegetable soup.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Woman', 3: 'Are you... Liv?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Ah, yes, I'm Liv, and you are...?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Young Woman', 3: "Didn't think I'd run into you here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Young Woman', 3: 'Do you remember conservation area 043? You... you saved me once!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Young Woman', 3: "I, I followed you to conservation area 046. I was going to head back to conservation area 043 to meet with you guys when I heard you'd defeated the two monsters, but...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The refugee pauses.'}
{2: 'Young Woman', 3: 'I... I came to thank you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Young Woman', 3: "I don't think I would have survived without the last bit of serum you gave me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Young Woman', 3: "Here... I've got a little something for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Young Woman', 3: "It's the serum tube... You saved me when you poured out the last bit of the serum and cleaned it with saline.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Young Woman', 3: 'I kept this bottle, filled it with soil from the basement, and planted a seed I found in a crack in a car.', 4: '1'}
{3: "This is what it's like now."}
{3: 'Planted in the glass tube, the delicate green shoot wobbles, looking every bit as fragile as it is resilient.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Thank you, but I don't think I can take th...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The refugee, however, turns and disappears into the crowd before Liv even finishes what she has to say.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3801_10.jpg'}
{3: 'The crowd huddles for warmth by the bonfire, but the one person they wished to see is absent.'}
{2: 'Where is Lucille?', 3: '177'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elean', 3: "Well... she's probably fine-tuning her vehicle... See, that one over there.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Walking toward where Elean is pointing, you find an orange-haired woman humming a tune as she scrubs the dirt off her vehicle.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory515.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Geez... These traces of the Red Tide are sure hard to get rid of.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Pretty sure Mika would have known what to do had she been here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Holy... Hey, Gray Raven Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "Wow... Didn't know commandants have names, too! I thought you were all just called Commandant 1, Commandant 2, and so on...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We all have names.', 3: '191', 4: 'Thank you for what you did back there tonight.', 5: '192'}
{2: 'Thank you for what you did back there tonight.', 3: '192'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Huh? What?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thanks for speaking up tonight.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "See, we're not terribly good at handling things like these.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "Oh, that? It's nothing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "There's no point in putting blame. Their sorrow is justified, but you haven't done anything wrong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "As someone who benefited from your rescue, I couldn't directly take your side and speak up for you back then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'I mean, I probably would have been the one crying had your transport craft landed over there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Eh... Sorry, was that a bad joke?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "Sometimes Mika says I can't read the room... Sigh.", 4: '1'}
{3: "We've had our fair share of encounters like the one from today, but it never gets easier when you see people suffering."}
{3: 'Had there been no Red Tide... Had there been no Hetero-Creatures...'}
{3: 'Had the Punishing Virus never even happened in the first place...'}
{3: 'These people would have been living the most ordinary of lives in this world, no?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucille', 3: 'There\'s no need to beat yourself up over things from so long ago... There\'s no "what if" in this world, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Most of the refugee groups on Earth dislike Babylonia because of the Great Evacuation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "I don't know if it's because I was too young to remember things, or if it's because my thoughts of what life was like back then haven't really changed...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'But I always find Earth more livable and comfortable than Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "Calling it Babylonia makes it sound nicer than it is when it's just a cage hanging in the sky.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Well, let's not forget that you've got to deal with all the Corrupted and Hetero-Creatures on Earth...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucille', 3: "Babylonia isn't absolutely safe, is it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crimson spiral tower flashes in your mind. Lucille senses the answer from your silence and smiles.'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Hey, look.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'In this world, no one is truly a survivor.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Babylonia is good in some ways and so is Earth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Constructs fight endlessly for humanity to return to Earth, and humans should do their part, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: "With our hands, our minds, our vehicles... We don't need anyone to pity us. We can save ourselves.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'We will survive, no matter what.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucille', 3: 'Our civilization will forever be rooted in Earth.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She hums a song as she continues to polish her beloved vehicle.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3801_10.jpg'}
{3: 'Back at the bonfire, Liv is calculating the expansion speed and direction of the Red Tide.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The Red Tide... is completely random.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The current expansion speed of the Red Tide is almost three to four times faster than before, and its direction is completely unpredictable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Judging from the pattern of the last "tide", the route I scouted this morning should be safe.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's a good thing that Commandant had me scout ahead, or else we would have all been seriously screwed.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Completely random.'}
{2: "Let's report this.", 3: '261', 4: 'Let me think about it some more.', 5: '247'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Red Tide... Hetero Zone... Expansion...'}
{3: 'An eerie sense of deja vu, M.I.N.D., anomaly...'}
{3: "All these ideas pop into your mind, but you can't quite seem to connect the dots."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3801_10.jpg'}
{2: "Let's report this.", 3: '261'}
{3: 'Right then, the terminal lets out a buzz.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Strange... even the signal booster isn't working...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Could it be that Babylonia's communication satellite is malfunctioning?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The terminal struggles to connect to the video call. Asimov appears on the screen, the dark circles on his face making him look gloomier than usual.'}
{2: 'I see your dark circles have gotten worse, Asimov.', 3: '271', 4: 'Why are you the one handling this mission?', 5: '272'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...We ain't got no time for jokes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I've requested a transfer order from Nikola. A transport craft from the nearest conservation area is already on its way to pick you up.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '277', 4: "I haven't heard that from anyone, though.", 5: '274'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Well, you will in no time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A mission update pops up on your terminal.'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "In short, we're planning to add an external interface to the Inver-Device and connect it to Gestalt, which is going to amplify consciousness and enhance the Inver-Device's processor.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After receiving the so-called "Dominik\'s Invitation" from Qu, you had a lengthy encrypted conversation with Asimov.'}
{3: 'Based on Qu\'s description, Asimov deduced that "Dominik" might be a set of data stored within Gestalt that entered Huaxu\'s simulation through Gestalt itself.'}
{2: 'Are you sure?', 3: '283'}
{3: 'Asimov gives you a long, thoughtful look.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "So far, you're the only Commandant who has engaged in operations within Gestalt. We need you to collaborate with the Constructs for this experiment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is this actually going to work?', 3: '287', 4: "Pretty sure it's going to work just fine.", 5: '289'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The test model has been validated. Success rate went from 64.13% to 69.29%.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "As long as the probability isn't zero, there's a chance it can be done.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The transport craft will arrive in about five minutes. Get ready.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'll fill you in on the specifics once we're back in Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With it, Asimov ends the call.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I've received a new mission order to help the refugees enter the Clean Zone with Liv.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia and Liv seem worried.'}
{2: "I'll be fine.", 3: '303', 4: 'No matter what happens...', 5: '300'}
{2: 'Lucia and Liv', 3: "...We'll all see one another again.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'The sun will shine once more.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png'}
{1: 'Babylonia', 2: 'Experiment Hall'}

{3: 'With one phase of the experiment temporarily complete, the team members hurry off to take a rest. Teddy sits alone with a blank face behind the unfinished prototype while going through her terminal.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Tsk... Ain't got nothing on Victoria, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "That's just sad.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'You even have the old man to help you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lowers her gaze, apparently recalling something unpleasant.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Christina, what's buried there is the seed of civilization.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Your father went on a great mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You must follow his path, trace his footsteps, and bring back his legacy.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Only Dominik, only Dominik... can lead humanity back to Earth.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: '...Bunch of nonsense.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Can a faith pursued with flesh and bones find its way to divinity?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Even if Dominik once led Norman Mining Corp to great heights...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Pale blue data shines in the pink-haired Construct's eyes as she focuses her attention on the screen."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Leonardo, you better have a way to stop them...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The codes in her terminal flicker as the pre-set interception program quickly captures the necessary information.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Project Herald cannot be reinitiated, no matter what...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Absurd beliefs should not be revisited, nor should meaningless sacrifices be glorified.'}
{3: 'She intercepts the information she needs and ponders for a moment before forwarding it.'}
